remarks: Two different intersecting lines (expressed in terms of atoms) meet at their common point (atom).  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2013.)
statement:

2llnm.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2llnm.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2llnm.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2llnma3r $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( P .\/ R ) =/= ( Q .\/ R ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ R ) ./\ ( Q .\/ R ) ) = R ) $.
